suppress.notes: Changing SecurityContext More Than Once in Single Request Can Fail to Save
This project doesn't use BCrypt / BCryptPasswordEncoder class https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-22976 https://tanzu.vmware.com/security/cve-2022-22976

CVE-2022-22978 suppression (false positive), because spring security already at (5.7.1) this is higher than the vulnerable versions (5.5.x prior to 5.5.7, 5.6.x prior to 5.6.4) https://tanzu.vmware.com/security/cve-2022-22978
CVE-2022-42003 suppression, because UNWRAP_SINGLE_VALUE_ARRAYS feature is disabled by default and not used in project
Currently no patch for this issue (https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-4277)
false positive, already using latest version of yaml
false positive, already using latest version of yaml
